data.actual_result: The file don't upload and the white bar stay loading
data.expected_result: The upload is aborted or the file stay uploading with a working bar
data.short_description: White bar remains with send to feature
data.steps_to_repro: - Select a picture in your gallery - press share button to share it to discord - press back button on your phone to abort the upload (Make sure the file isn't already uploaded )
